title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, list, pull, push, and delete models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-GUI) with chat history, model management, and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers synchronous & asynchronous APIs for chat, generate, pull, and embeddings.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple interface to chat, complete, embed, and manage local models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with conversation memory, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings Ollama-powered code completion and inline chat into the editor.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app for Ollama with model selector, parameter sliders, and conversation export.

title: ollama-laravel
summary: Laravel service provider and facade for Ollama; chat, generate, and manage models from PHP artisan or controllers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling options.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Unofficial Dart/Flutter package for Ollama; chat and generate text locally from mobile or desktop apps.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with chat, generate, embeddings, and model management; targets .NET 6+.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash commands for chatting with local models in any Slack workspace.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for AI-assisted writing using Ollama; inline prompts, summarization, and custom commands.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for Ollama; same JS/TS client as ollama-js with weekly downloads and semantic versioning.
